name: Byron J. Gao
content: Byron Gao Homepage Byron Gao Office: Comal 311D / Email: bgao@txstate.edu / Phone: (512) 245-0348 / Fax: (512) 245-8750 Department of Computer Science, Texas State University, 601 University Drive, San Marcos, TX 78666 Bio Byron Gao is an associate professor of computer science at Texas State University. He joined Texas State in 2008, was a postdoctoral fellow at the University of Wisconsin in 2007-2008, and received Ph.D. in 2007 and B.Sc. in 2003 from Simon Fraser University. His research spans several related fields of data mining, databases, information retrieval and bioinformatics. Teaching CS 4315: Introduction to Data Mining and Information Retrieval CS 7312: Advanced Data Mining CS 3378: Theory of Automata CS 5338: Formal Languages Research Publications: DBLP Lab: DMLab Misc: Best-of-SDM'06 research paper, KDD'07 best research paper finalist, Erdos number 3 Professional services PC member: SDM'25, AAAI'25, KDD'24, ICDM'24, SDM'24, AAAI'24, KDD'23, ICDM'23, SDM'23, ICDM'22, KDD'22, SDM'22, AAAI'22, ICDM'21, KDD'21, SDM'21, KDD'20, SDM'20, CIKM'19, KDD'19, ECML/PKDD'19, SDM'19, ICDM'18, CIKM'18, ECML/PKDD'18,WWW'18, KDD'18, SDM'18, CIKM'17, ECML/PKDD'17, KDD'17, ICDM'16, ECML/PKDD'16, KDD'16, ECML/PKDD'15, KDD'15, ICDM'15, ECML/PKDD'14, ICDM'14, WWW'14, ICDM'13, ICDM'12, SDM'12, ICDM'11, ECML/PKDD'11, KDD'11, SDM'11, KDD'10 Reviewer: TKDE, TKDD, DMKD, TEVC, TIST, KAIS, DKE, Discrete Applied Mathematics, Computational Intelligence, Applied Intelligence, TSMCB, ESWA Note to PhD applicants: I apologize I do not normally reply to inquiring emails unless you're already a student at TXST. Please contact our department's PhD committee for application matters.
